transArray.content: The service is warm and thoughtful. What is commendable is that due to the delayed train travel time, the hotel has specially extended the time to 4 pm and it is free of charge. Like üëç and I will come to Ji Hotel often in the future.
The time is just right, the breeze is not dry, thank you old friend for your support, Xiao Ji is willing to accompany you through the long years.
